module.name: person_organization_assignment
module.purpose: The Person organization assignment application module supports the requirement to assign an organization or a person in an organization to product data.

inscope.li: the assignment of an organization to product data;
the assignment of a person in an organization to product data.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the assignment of organizations or people within them.

uof.name: Organization_Or_Person_In_Organization_Assignment
uof.description: The Organization_Or_Person_In_Organization_Assignment UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of the assignment of an organization or a person in an organization to product data.

aa.refpath: (person_and_organization_assignment person_and_organization_assignment.role -> person_and_organization_role -> person_and_organization_role.name) (organization_assignment organization_assignment.role -> organization_role -> organization_role.name)
